# Learn about drake

The main resources to learn `drake` are the [user manual](https://ropenscilabs.github.io/drake-manual/), the [reference website](https://ropensci.github.io/drake/), [`learndrake`](https://github.com/wlandau/learndrake), and [`drakeplanner`](https://github.com/wlandau/drakeplanner). The information from this vignette has moved to the [manual](https://ropenscilabs.github.io/drake-manual/).
